title: Domus de Janas on Monte Crobu
description: A prehistoric chamber tomb of the third millennium B.C. The 'Domus de Janas' tombs are typical of the Ozieri and Beaker cultures and are found chiefly on Sardinia.

properties.description: Representative location based on Wikimapia, verified in Google Earth 2013.
properties.title: Wikimapia location of Domus de janas on Monte Crobu
